segments.text: This is infuriating, look at that mess in the kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's just drying dishes while the sink overflows wildly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water is pouring out, soaking the floor and cabinets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's got her foot in the puddle and doesn't even blink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can she be so unaware of the disaster happening?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Now the children are making it worse, climbing on an unstable stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is reaching into the cookie jar like it's his right.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That stool is tilting, he's going to fall and break something.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is encouraging him, reaching up for stolen cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're breaking rules, sneaking treats behind her back.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks perfect, but inside it's chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone needs to stop this before it all goes wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't stand seeing such carelessness in a home.
segments.speaker: PAR
